88521.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"93u0q","text":"Add 5 times the sample's volume of   into the PCR tube with the PCR product.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f2106","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"41073076341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"PB buffer","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"19066","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/shop/lab-basics/buffers-and-reagents/buffer-pb/#orderinginformation","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/products/","name":"Qiagen"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dsv0a","text":"Discard the flow-through and place the QIAquick column back into the same tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50p6n","text":"Discard the flow-through and place the QIAquick column back into the same tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6u1nn","text":"Centrifuge the emptied QIAquick column at   to remove residual  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":63,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"56al6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"13","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"57AE13565DD311EE9F150A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"41072B5F341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Buffer PE","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"19065","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/shop/lab-basics/buffers-and-reagents/buffer-pe/#orderinginformation","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/products/","name":"Qiagen"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4i99i","text":"Transfer the QIAquick column into the newly labelled Eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"691mh","text":"Add   of DI water into the QIAquick column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cgcj2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3j0q5","text":"Centrifuge it at  , ensuring that the direction of the Eppendorf tube’s cap is the same as the direction of spinning to avoid breaking.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"13","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"57AE13565DD311EE9F150A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"adcpj","text":"Discard the QIAquick column, the solution left in the Eppendorf tube contains the DNA fragments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4lj2b","text":"Use the Nanodrop to measure and record the purity and concentration of the DNA fragments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"988io","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"34lpd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"brand":"Thermo Scientific","can_edit":0,"file":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"guid":"452AEEEB341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","image":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"link":null,"name":"NanoDrop™ One/OneC Microvolume UV-Vis Spectrophotometer","sku":"ND-ONE-W","specifications":null,"type":"UV-Vis Spectrophotometer","vendor":{"id":95,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.thermofisher.com/us/en/home.html","name":"Thermo Fisher Scientific"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6rhph","text":"Transfer the whole solution into a QIAquick Spin Column (purple tube) and ensure that the sample is dripped onto the white membrane in the column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50p6n","text":"Discard the flow-through and place the QIAquick column back into the same tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e9utk","text":"Centrifuge the oligo pool for a few seconds before opening the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f1acs","text":"Calculate the volume of   required for the oligo pool (the final concentration of the sample must be at least 20ng/μL).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dn6oi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"41072BB0341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Buffer EB","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"19086","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/shop/lab-basics/buffers-and-reagents/buffer-eb/#orderinginformation","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/products/","name":"Qiagen"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"chs0m","text":"Add the respective volume of   into the tube with the oligos and resuspend the dried oligos by pipetting the solution.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"78oa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"41072BB0341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Buffer EB","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"19086","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/shop/lab-basics/buffers-and-reagents/buffer-eb/#orderinginformation","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/products/","name":"Qiagen"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1t7uu","text":"Prepare a PCR tube, and add the following reagents: \n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mqdn","text":"     KOD one      25μL        Each Primer      1.5μL        Template      1μL        DI Water      21μL   ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":106}],"data":{}},{"key":"77q5v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"}},"colTitles":["Item","Volume"],"colWidths":["310","103"],"data":[["KOD OneTM PCR Master Mix (Blue)","  25μL  "],["  Each Primer  (Two Primers In Total)","  1.5μL  "],["Oligo Pool Sample","  1μL  "],["  DI Water  ","  21μL  "]],"guid":"209DA9A50459478380BDD42C2B04D88C","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["KOD OneTM PCR Master Mix (Blue)","  25μL  "],["  Each Primer  (Two Primers In Total)","  1.5μL  "],["Oligo Pool Sample","  1μL  "],["  DI Water  ","  21μL  "]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"auopl","text":"Run a PCR with the following setting:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"am22h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11rvv","text":"     98°C      10s        60°C      5s        68°C      10s        Go to step 1, repeat the cycle 10\n  times        68°C      5 minutes        12°C      Infinite Loop   ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":169}],"data":{}},{"key":"89r6t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_5":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_6":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_5":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_6":{"className":"_dt-h-center"}},"colTitles":["Temperature","Duration"],"colWidths":["243","243"],"data":[["  98°C  ","  10s  "],["  60°C  ","  5s  "],["  68°C  ","  10s  "],["  Go to step 1, repeat the cycle 10 times  ",""],["  68°C  ","  5 minutes  "],["  12°C  ","  Infinite Loop  "]],"guid":"2EB32E45E743453ABE1A986DE9CB10B1","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{"A_4":[2,1]},"printData":[["  98°C  ","  10s  "],["  60°C  ","  5s  "],["  68°C  ","  10s  "],["  Go to step 1, repeat the cycle 10 times  ",""],["  68°C  ","  5 minutes  "],["  12°C  ","  Infinite Loop  "]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}
